scripts.build: echo "Attempting to install pnpm@10.11.0 globally..." && npm install -g pnpm@10.11.0 && echo "pnpm installation command completed. Navigating to root and running pnpm commands..." && cd ../.. && pnpm --version && echo "Running pnpm install..." && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile --prefer-offline && echo "Running nx build..." && pnpm exec nx build test-app --configuration=production && echo "Build script finished."
scripts.start: cd ../.. && pnpm --version && pnpm exec serve -s dist/apps/test-app/browser -l tcp://0.0.0.0:${PORT:-8080}
